Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product comes with a range of features and benefits that we believe could significantly enhance your experience. Considering its quality and functionality, I'm extending an exclusive offer for you today. For a limited time only, you can purchase this exceptional product for $150. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your routine or project with the best solution available. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
